newsitem.title: GERMANY: DT IPO price range 25-30 marks - paper.
newsitem.headline: DT IPO price range 25-30 marks - paper.

text.p: The price range for Deutsche Telekom AG's initial public offering has been set at 25 to 30 marks, according to the mass daily Bild newspaper.
Without mentioning a source, the newspaper said Telekom and the banks managing its 15-billion-mark ($9.7 billion) listing agreed on the price range at the weekend.
A spokesman for Deutsche Bank, the lead manager of the issue, declined comment on the report, saying the information would be released later in the day.
Deutsche Telekom will hold a news conference at 0800 GMT to discuss the final details in its sales prospectus and kick off the bookbuilding phase of its listing.
During bookbuilding, prospective investors will make bids for Telekom shares within a price range set by the company and its banks.
The final share price will be set on the weekend of November 16 and 17. Trading in the shares will begin on November 18 in Germany and New York and a day later in Tokyo.
-- William Boston, Bonn Newsroom, 49 228 26097150 ($ = 1.542 German Marks)
